prompt: punk, rock, fast, raw, aggressive, guitar, drums, rebellious, male vocal
lyrics:
[intro-short]

[verse]
My girlfriend's mom is watching every move I make
From my worn-out jacket to the chords I play
She says I'm just a phase that her daughter will outgrow
But in this basement band is the only home I know

[chorus]
Yeah, she hates my songs and my ripped-up jeans
Says I'll never be more than broken dreams
But when we plug in and the crowd screams loud
We turn her judgement into feedback sound

[outro-short]
